Cfp.description: Want to participate in our Call for Papers? Head over to Sessionize and submit your ideas :)
Cfp.description_1: Read along if you would like to know more about the topics that are of higher interest for our community attendees
Cfp.description_2: You can find all the community info on our website

About.title: Open Source Day 2023
About.subtitle: About
About.description: Let's find out how you can help the Open Source community achieve great results in organizing one of the best conferences ever! :)

Agenda.title: Open Source Day 2023
Agenda.subtitle: Agenda
Agenda.description: We are still looking for Speakers and organising the event! Want to participate? :)
Agenda.heading: Head over to the <cfp>CFP</cfp> page or contact us directly @ <link>SH</link>
Agenda.heading_2: You can find all the community info on our website, <link>Schrodingers Hat</link> and if you have any questions about inclusivity, diversity or accessibility please ask us at any time!
Agenda.agenda_1: Our call for papers is still open! Want to join? :)

Speakers.title: Open Source Day 2023
Speakers.subtitle: These are the great minds that will talk about tech and open source :) Coming soon
Speakers.description: We are still exploring your submissions so if you have an idea and you would like to talk about it head over to our CFP
Speakers.heading: A few things to think about :)
Speakers.apply: Apply as Speaker at our event in Florence in March 2023
Speakers.talk: Give it your best and prepare a great talk so everyone will remember how good it was :D
Speakers.event: On the day of the event, come a little earlier so that we can set you up and try your talk!

Main.heading: Take a look at the first edition

Sponsor.title: Open Source Day 2023
Sponsor.subtitle: Would you like to become a Sponsor for Open Source Day 2023?
Sponsor.description: We are looking for companies that believe in our project, and want to sponsor us. Are you interested ? Send us an email! :)
Sponsor.platinum_offer: Tech talk, Attendees list, Stand in expose area, Social awarness, Logo on streaming video, Rollup, Logo on website, Logo on social post, Thanks post
Sponsor.diamond_offer: Attendees list, Stand in expose area, Social awarness, Logo on streaming video, Rollup, Logo on website, Logo on social post, Thanks post
Sponsor.gold_offer: Social awarness, Logo on streaming video, Rollup, Logo on website, Logo on social post, Thanks post
Sponsor.silver_offer: Rollup, Logo on website, Logo on social post, Thanks post
Sponsor.community_offer: Logo on our website, Thanks post.
Sponsor.media_offer: Logo on our website, Logo on our branded materials, Logo on social post, Thanks post

Venue.title: Open Source Day 2023
Venue.subtitle: We have a wonderful Venue
Venue.description: Keep in touch through our channels (Discord, LinkedIn or Twitter) to know which Venue will host us for this event :)
Venue.heading: Want to know more about the Venue for this event? :) Keep yourself posted on <linkedin>LinkedIn</linkedin>, <twitter>Twitter</twitter> or better yet, <discord>Discord</discord>!

Hero.description_1: We are coming back with a new edition of the Open Source Day conference. In this season we are going to smash everything.
Hero.description_2: The best companies and the best professionals in the sector in Open Source projects
